title: Deshaun Watson Receives 6 Game Suspension
description:
Field Yates and the NFL Live crew discuss Deshaun Watson being suspended for six games for violating NFL’s personal conduct policy, Kevin Stefanski’s comments on Deshaun’s suspension, and Deebo Samuel’s 3-year 73.5 million dollar extensions with the 49ers. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Deshaun Watson is suspended for 6 games and Deebo Samuel finally gets paid.
